name: LD48: Colonoscopy - Search for the Inner Child
name_original: LD48: Colonoscopy - Search for the Inner Child
description:
Well, I couldn't get as much done as I wanted - you fly down the colon and try and get the polyp (or corn? :D)  I didn't get the Inner Child part that I wanted to try. 

Please let me know if you enjoyed it or not.

Also rank me at : https://uncleintheattic.itch.io/ld48-csftic
